name: The Sorcerer's Cave
description:
Play as a sorcerer journeying into the mystic caves in search of powerful magic crystals. Flip the crystals with your spells, until all of them are dark or the time runs out. Do well enough and you’ll unlock more spells to use! 

Unlock 14 different spells to use in this fast paced Lights Out inspired puzzle game - toggle the lights off, freeze them, light them on fire, or smite them with chain lightning. Combine spells to trigger cascade effects and just destroy the lights and smash your way to victory!

This is our first game, and we'd really love any feedback - if you download the game and loved it, hated it, or it won't work on your computer, please fill out our survey.
